title: Montreal hosts G7 ministers to talk about AI
description: Artificial intelligence is likely to take up much of the agenda as industry, digital and technology ministers from the world’s most powerful Western countries meet in Montreal this week.
content:
OTTAWA -- Artificial intelligence is likely to take up much of the agenda as industry, digital and technology ministers from the world’s most powerful Western countries meet in Montreal this week.

title: Artificial Intelligence: The Catalyst for India's Future Growth
description: Union Minister Manohar Lal Khattar emphasized artificial intelligence's crucial role in driving India's growth by 2047, highlighting its potential in diverse sectors and the need for responsible use. During the India International Science Festival, advancements in AI and India's space achievements were celebrated, alongside a nod to inspirational thinkers.
content: Union Power and Housing Minister Manohar Lal Khattar has underscored the transformative power of artificial intelligence (AI) in India's development leading up to 2047. Speaking at the India International Science Festival, he hailed AI as an engine f... [783 chars]

title: Google Says First AI Glasses With Gemini Will Arrive in 2026
description: Alphabet Inc.’s Google said it’s working to create two different categories of artificial intelligence-powered smart glasses to compete next year with existing models from Meta Platforms Inc.: one with screens, and another that’s audio focused.

title: AI Slop Is Spurring Record Requests for Imaginary Journals
description: The International Committee of the Red Cross warned that artificial intelligence models are making up research papers, journals and archives
content:
Never heard of the Journal of International Relief or the International Humanitarian Digital Repository? That’s because they don’t exist.

title: AI is improving colon cancer diagnosis accuracy, study finds
description: A recent study reveals that integrating Artificial Intelligence (AI) into colon cancer diagnosis over the past five years has significantly improved the speed and accuracy of the detection of the deadly disease.
content:

title: Trump approves sale of more advanced Nvidia computer chips used in AI to China
description: WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said Monday that he would allow Nvidia to sell an advanced type of computer chip used in the development of artificial intelligence to “approved customers” in China. There have been concerns about allowing advanced computer chips to be sold to China as it could help

title: AI computer startup hits $4.5 billion valuation in seed round
description: A two-month-old startup from the former head of artificial intelligence at Databricks Inc. has raised a seed round of funding from investors ;at a valuation of $4.5 billion for its effort to build a novel, more energy-efficient computer for AI.

title: Tesla’s sky high valuation prompts Morgan Stanley to cut rating
description: Elon Musk is eager to transform Tesla Inc. into a robotics and artificial intelligence company, but the electric-vehicle maker's stock price already reflects those businesses and is at a "full valuation" according to Morgan Stanley.

title: Fight over artificial intelligence rules continues
description: All 50 states and DC have introduced AI legislation this year, with 38 states adopting around 100 measures in 2025.
content:
President Donald Trump will sign an executive order this week establishing a federal framework around artificial intelligence, a move aimed at pre-empting states from imposing their own laws on the mega-popular technology.
